sqlMap.statement: create table friendlist_$num$( mem_num number primary key not null, id varchar2(100) not null, name varchar2(4000) not null, state varchar2(100) not null, categ varchar2(100) not null, reg date not null )
create sequence sq_friendlist_$num$ start with 1 increment by 1 nocache
sqlMap.select: select * from friendlist_$num$, memberlist where friendlist_$num$.mem_num = memberlist.num
select * from friendlist_$num$, memberlist where friendlist_$num$.mem_num = memberlist.num and state=0
select * from friendlist_$num$, memberlist where friendlist_$num$.mem_num = memberlist.num and state=1
select * from friendlist_$num$, memberlist where friendlist_$num$.mem_num = memberlist.num and state=2
select * from friendlist_$num$, memberlist where friendlist_$num$.mem_num = memberlist.num and state=-1
sqlMap.update: update friendlist_$mem_num$ set state=#state# where mem_num=#num#
